title: David Lives Among the Philistines
summary: Fearing for his life, David seeks refuge in Philistine territory and is given the town of Ziklag. He pretends to serve the Philistine king, Achish, while secretly attacking Israelâ€™s enemies.

faq.question: Why did David go to the Philistines?
faq.answer: To escape Saul, believing he would be safer in enemy territory.

faq.question: What was David really doing while in Ziklag?
faq.answer: He was attacking other nations but deceiving Achish into thinking he fought Israel.
